reviewText: This is an effective interactive Bible Study. Our church loved this.
I haven't used this one yet. Not sure. Would like to review the other items mentioned but apparently cannot do so without writing the required amount of words!!

My youth (9th-12th grades) really enjoyed the videos and the discussion afterward.  Hearing thoughts from current worship artists really made an impact. I liked it because the length of each video was just right and the topics were just what the kids needed at this time in their lives.
This study will let your students learn by means they love, music! Appropriate for middle and high school students. Great price from BSP. I wish there were more than 4 volumes!

My daughter uses these for her Fellowship of Christian athletes group at school.  We have also used them for our youth group.  They are relevant to today's youth without being too preachy.  We own all of them.  Great value!
This and the other 3 volumes are amazing. God used this series to minister to my youth group at 2 different churches now.
